info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN TRANSYLVANIA... NORTHWESTERN GREENVILLE AND NORTH CENTRAL PICKENS COUNTIES UNTIL 300 PM EDT... At 225 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 12 miles south of Brevard, or near Caesars Head State Park, moving east at 10 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Caesars Head State Park, Table Rock State Park, Jones Gap State Park, Cedar Mountain and Sassafras Mountain. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: The combination of gusty winds and saturated soil conditions will cause scattered trees and power lines to fall. Seek shelter inside an interior room.
